message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product. It is truly exceptional and I believe it would greatly benefit you. Considering its value and the benefits it provides, I am offering it to you for $15,000.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the quality of the product, $15,000 is a bit more than I'm willing to spend right now. I'd be happy to buy it for $12,000, which is my maximum budget.
